entry.title: JatinRana1/SimpleCalculator: This is a lightweight and user-friendly calculator built using React. It provides basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The calculator features a clean and responsive UI, making it easy to use on both desktop and mobile devices.
entry.content: This is a lightweight and user-friendly calculator built using React. It provides basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The calculator features a clean and responsive UI, making it easy to use on both desktop and mobile devices.
